title: The Cleveland Guarditrends 7/23: Ben & Jerry's, Olympics, Cleveland Guardians, Lil Nas X, Donda, Rick Dennison
itunes:title: The Cleveland Guarditrends 7/23: Ben & Jerry's, Olympics, Cleveland Guardians, Lil Nas X, Donda, Rick Dennison
description:
In this edition of the Cleveland Guarditrends, Jack and special guest host Jamie Loftus discuss the Right cancelling Ben & Jerry's, the opening ceremonies of the Olympics, the Cleveland Guardians, Lil Nas X's new single, Kanye's weird listening party for 'Donda', and Vikings coach Rick Dennison getting fired for refusing to get vaccinated

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
